page.description: Skip over a number of characters.
page.syntax: Text as C = ScanOver as c(count as n)

argument.name: Text
argument.description: The text between the starting and ending offset positions.

argument.name: count
argument.description: The number of characters to move the offset.

page.discussion: The <StringScanner>.ScanOver() function moves the offset by Number characters. The argument can be positive (moving towards the end of the buffer) or negative (moving towards the start of the buffer).
page.example: dim scanner as P dim txt as C txt = <<%text% This is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note. %text% scanner = stringscanner.create(txt) ? scanner.text = This is magnificent prose written by a technical writer of note. ? scanner.scanover(5) = "This " ? scanner.getremainder() = is wonderful prose written by a technical writer of note.
